mathematica: a[n_ /; EvenQ[n] && n > 0, k_] := a[n, k] = a[n - 1, k] - a[n - 1, k - 1]; a[n_ /; OddQ[n] && n > 0, k_] := a[n, k] = k*a[n - 1, k] + (n - k + 1)*a[n - 1, k - 1]; a[0,_]=0; a[1,1]=1; Flatten[Table[a[n,k], {n,12}, {k, n}]] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, May 02 2011 *)
prog: (Haskell)a049061 n k = a049061_tabl !! (n-1) !! (k-1)a049061_row n = a049061_tabl !! (n-1)a049061_tabl = map fst $ iterate t ([1], 1) where   t (row, k) = (if odd k then us else vs, k + 1) where     us = zipWith (-) (row ++ [0]) ([0] ++ row)     vs = zipWith (+) ((zipWith (*) ks row) ++ [0])                      ([0] ++ (zipWith (*) (reverse ks) row))          where ks = [1..k]-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 30 2013
